entry.title: Valentines Day Sms
entry.content:
best Teddy Day 2014 Messages, Text Greetings, Sms

Give Room To Your Love Dreams
Whenever You Have A Dream Inside Your Heart
Never Let It Go Coz Dreams Are The Tiny Seeds
From Which Beautiful Tomorrow Grows
==================================

best Teddy Day 2014 Messages, Text Greetings, Sms

I Just Say The Few Loving Words For You
My Past Says You Met Me
My Present Says You Will Understand Me
My Future Says You Will Care For Me
But My Heart Says You Will Always Remember Me
Happy Valentines Day…..

Valentines Day Sms

Some Valentines Tips To Get A Gril In Your Hand
1. Hug her from behind
2. Grab her hand when you guys walk next to each other.
3. When standing, wrap your arms around her.
4. Cuddle with her.
5. Dont force her to do ANYTHING!
6. Write little notes.
7. Compliment her.
8. When you hug her, hold her in your arms as long as possible.
9. Say I love you and MEAN IT
10. Brush the hair out of her eyes
11. Comfort her when she cries.
12. Love her with all your heart Girls

entry.title: Valentine's Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings
entry.content:
best Valentine’s Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings

Oru vasantha kalaaam,
Bhoomiyil Niraye pookal parimalam parathunnu….
Padathoo kunjiii kilikall virunnu vannu….
aaa pular kalathu nee ente veetilekku vannu .
appol naajan eente vathilll ninnakai turannnu.???
ninte kaikal enteee nere neendu vannuuu..
AMMA VALLATUM TARANEE…
Happy Valentines Day 2013…


best Valentine’s Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings

Liebe kann,
fand in der Wärme eines Kusses, in einem Hauch
oder eine anhaltende Umarmung?.
Liebe kann
gefunden in einem süßen, zärtlichen Blick oder einem
Lächeln, lacht sich das Gesicht?
Liebe kann
fand in Worten leise gesprochen, in
komfortable Stille auch?.
Liebe kann
found in beliebigen Anzahl von Möglichkeiten?
Und ich Liebe gefunden
wann? ..
? Ich dich gefunden?
Happy Valentines Day 2013 Sayings in English
“As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change… I will always keep falling in love with you.” - By Karen Clodfelder
=====================================
“Love is as much of an object as an obsession, everybody wants it, everybody seeks it, but few ever achieve it, those who do will cherish it, be lost in it, and among all, never… never forget it.” - By Curtis Judalet
=====================================
“Women wish to be loved not because they are pretty, or good, or well bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.” - By Henri Frederic Amiel
=====================================
“There is abundant testimony That if we choose love rather than self, We gain immeasurably” - By Federico Fellini
=====================================
“I have been astonished that men could die martyrs for their religion- I have shudder’d at it. I shudder no more. I could be martyr’d for my religion Love is my religion And I could die for that I could die for you.” - By John Keats
=====================================
“The moment we indulge our affections, the earth is metamorphosed, there is no winter and no night; all tragedies, all ennui s, vanish, all duties even.” - By Ralph Waldo Emerson
=====================================
“Don’t be afraid of showing affection. Be warm and tender, thoughtful and affectionate. Men are more helped by sympathy than by service. Love is more than money, and a kind word will give more pleasure than a present.”- By Sir John Lubbock
=====================================
“The two qualities which chiefly inspire regard and affection [Are] that a thing is your own and that it is your only one.” - By Aristotle
 Valentines Day Wishes Quotes 2013 for Him, Her

Valentine’s Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings

To My Valentine
T-o il mio Valentino, con tutto il mio amore,
O-f che non posso dire abbastanza nella lode,
M-ay mio amore per te sufficiente dimostrare,
Y-guadagnare per riscattare le vostre giornate caustiche.
V-ortices dentro non ti trascini verso il basso.
A-nchor, poi, nella mia serenità.
L-ove risparmiare un po ‘, che altrimenti potrebbero annegare,
E-mbarked solo sulla loro Galilea.
N-o si dovrebbe ritenere vostro amore non basta
T-o la cappella in cui mi ritiro
I-n cerca di un padiglione per il mio dolore.
N-o l’amore è amore a meno che non si tratti di una sede
E-nchanted, dove una pietra potrebbe piangere di nuovo.
==================================

entry.title: Propose Day Hindi, English Poems For Love, Boyfriend
entry.content:
best Valentine’s Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings

The company of good people is like
da shop of perfume.even if u buy or not
U’ll still get lot of gud fragrance.

best Valentine’s Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings

Propose Day Shayari:
tum se Kuch kehnay ko dil krta ha,
aur Jisay kehty huey darr lagta ha,
Aaaj Propose Day Hai….
Keh Hi Dalte Ha, Hum Tumhein…
Dil o Jaan se Zyada…Muhabbat Krte Hai..
Sandle na utaaareyo …
mazaak kar riyaa tha…
Happy Propose Day 2013..


Propose Day Hindi, English Poems For Love, Boyfriend

For my part,,
I consider that it will be found,
Much better by all parties,
To leave The past to history,
Especially as I propose,
To write that history myself.
I LOve You..

entry.title: Hug Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes, Sms For Desktop, Pc, Compute
entry.content:
best Valentine’s Day 2014 Love Sms

I used to be a hopeless romantic……
I fell in love with everyone I went out with.
Happy Valentines day 2 u..
morning..


best Valentine’s Day 2014 Love Sms

If you won’t be my Valentine
I’ll scream, I’ll yell, I’ll bite.
I’ll cry aloud, I’ll start to whine
If you won’t be my Valentine.
I’ll frown and fret, I’ll mope and pine, and
It will serve you right —
If you won’t be my Valentine
I’ll scream, I’ll Yell, I’ll Bite!
===============================

Hug Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes, Sms For Desktop, Pc, Compute

Poetry spills from the cracks of a broken heart,
but flows from one which is loved.
Have A Happy Valentine Day.

entry.title: Happy Teddy Day Sms ..!!
entry.content:
best Kiss Day Sms

The hours Of Life I spend with u…
I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden,
A dim twilight,
And a fountain singing to it.
U & U alone make me feel…
That Im alive.
Other men its said have seen angels,
But I have seen thee & thou art enough…
Love u ..
Happy Valentines Day My angel…


best Kiss Day Sms

As a matter of fact,
she has refused to marry me…
So when’s the wedding?????
Tell Me Dear ??


Happy Teddy Day Sms ..!!

Do u know whats A B C D E F G?
A Boy Can Do Everything For Girl
Now reverse da order, can u guess the full form of: G F E D C B A ?
Girls Forgets Everything Done & Catches(new) Boy Again.

entry.title: Happy Chocolate Day 2014 Sms
entry.content:
best Chocolate Day 2014 Sms for Computer Desktop

Promise Day Quotes For Customer:
If you make the customer a promise..
make sure you deliver it…
We Doing that sinse 5 years..
Happy Promise Day 2 All..


best Chocolate Day 2014 Sms for Computer Desktop

In Hindi Language:
A Boy proposes a Girl
If she says “Yes”
What Boy feels ???
“Pata nai kitnon ko haaan bola hoga??
If she says No…
They feel ???
Wo khud ko Katrina kareena samajti hai??
Hahahaha….
Lovely Indians…


Happy Chocolate Day 2014 Sms

Be my valentine,
in the east or west,
you know I love you best,
so give up the all rest,
and be my valentine,
no matter what the season,
it’s you I should be pleasing,
I love you is the reason,
be my valentine..Eid hob sa’eed, habibti..
==============================

Best Collection On Happy Valentines Day 2014 Messages Greetings, Sms,

Say I Love You In Different Languages to your Boyfriend – Girlfriend, Saying “I Love You” to sweetheart in 100 Different languages, Full List of “I Love You” in Different 100 languages.
Valentine Day is the day of love and fever is on. Many of the crazy lovers would be thinking of expressing their love in Unique and Stylish Way. Saying “I Love You” to sweetheart in 100 languages or more is one of a passion that attracts a lot of lovebirds.
Saying “I Love You” in 100 languages means even if the expressions have differences in look and sound, love is one and universal.
Happy Valentines Day, Solve  your difficulty with an exclusive list of “I Love You” in 100 languages, covering all major languages of the world.

entry.title: Cute Promise Day Sms 2014
entry.content:
best Full Romantic Hug Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings 2014




Lovable Collection On Happy Valentines Day 2013 SMS, Messages In Russian, Valentine’s Day Russian SMS, Messages, Quotes, Sayings, Happy Valentines Day 2013 Love Greetings, Wishes..
Yesli by ya mog byt? vse chto ugodno v mire ? ?
YA khotel by byt?Slezy vy Prety Face …
cozz YA khotel by rodit?sya v ur krasivyye glaza ….
zhit? na ur Mlechnyy Mlechnyy shcheki ,
I umirat? na ur Roza , kak guby ….
Schastlivyy den? Svyatogo Valentina Uvazhayemyye Sladkaya drugu..
===================================
Istinnaya lyubov? oznachayet:
2 chuvstvuyu some1 v kazhdom serdtsebiyeniye,
2 findsome1 v kazhdoy mysli,
2 C some1 s zakrytymi glazami,
i 2 promakha some1 bez uvazhitel?nykh prichin
===================================
Kak den? smenyayetsya noch?yu
YA skuchayu po tebe imeyushchikh na moyey storone
Moye serdtse poyet pesnyu skazat?,
YA skuchayu po tebe bol?she, chem slova mozhno skazat?,
Dnem Svyatogo Valentina .
===================================
Yesli ya nakhozhus? v adu & Ur na nebesakh,
YA budu iskat? i radovat?sya U.
Yesli ya v rayu i v adu Ura ,
YA budu molit?sya , chtoby Bog poslal menya na zemlyu,
Potomu chto nebo ne nebo bez U.
Dnem Svyatogo Valentina..
===================================
Odnazhdy u menya sprosite :
Chto vazhneye dlya vas,
menya ili zhizn??
YA govoryu: moya zhizn??
Vy uydete ot menya
ne znaya, chto U R MY LIFE !
HAPPY UVAZHAYEMYYe VALENTINES ………
===================================
Schastlivyye prokhladnyy den? Svyatogo Valentina , ..
Inogda my zanimayemsya lyubov?yu s nashikh glaz.
Summa V – tym sdelat? Luv VID nashikh rukakh ….
Summa V – tym sdelat? Luv VID nashikh tel …
Vsegda my Luv VID nashikh serdtsakh …


best Full Romantic Hug Day Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes Greetings 2014

The one thing we can never get enough of is love.
And the one thing we never give enough is love.
Happy Valentines Day..!!
